meanings.definition: The projection of a figure or part from the ground or plane on which it is formed.
meanings.sent1: The relievo of the horse on the coin stood out prominently.
meanings.sent2: The artist created a beautiful relievo of a flower on the wall.
meanings.sent3: The relievo of the cat on the door seemed to come to life.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a relievo, bright and three-dimensional.
meanings.sent5: The relievo of the mountain on the mural was so realistic.
